name: Frogbike
description:
Frogbike is a lo-fi puzzle game written in the Puzzlescript engine. You are the Frogbike, plagued by magnets blocking your path to freedom

But there is a way forward. Use the magnet's repulsive power against themselves to clear the way.

This is your sacred task. You are the Frogbike.

CONTROLS

MOVEMENT - ARROW KEYS UNDO - Z RESTART LEVEL - R MENU SELECT - X OPEN MENU - ESC
